# minSupportedLockedVideoFrameDuration

**Instance Property**

The maximum frame rate (expressed as a minimum duration) that can be set on an input associated with this device.

## Declaration

```swift
var minSupportedLockedVideoFrameDuration: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion

`kCMTimeInvalid` is returned when the device or its current configuration does not support locked frame rate. Use [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDeviceInput/activeLockedVideoFrameDuration] to set the locked frame rate on the input.

## Synchronizing with external devices

- **isFollowingExternalSyncDevice**: Whether the device is following an external sync device.
- **minSupportedExternalSyncFrameDuration**: The minimum frame duration that can be passed as the `videoFrameDuration` when directing your device input to follow an external sync device.
- **isVideoFrameDurationLocked**: Whether the device’s video frame rate (expressed as a duration) is currently locked.
